excerpt: A fresh and flavorful salad with all the classic Greek ingredients - without the feta!

instructions.name: Make the Dressing
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt and black pepper until well combined.

instructions.name: Assemble the Salad
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, kalamata olives, green bell pepper and chopped parsley.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to coat.
Divide the salad evenly between two plates and serve immediately.
